CustomField.description: Check this field if this article is linked to a keyword. When checked, this article will not appear in the Featured Articles section of the PKB and will instead appear as a Recommended article whenever the keyword(s) specified on this record are searched for.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this field if this article is linked to a keyword. When checked, this article will not appear in the Featured Articles section of the PKB and will instead appear as a Recommended article whenever the keyword(s) specified on this record are searched
CustomField.label: Is Keyword Article?
